issue.title: Windows: __declspec(dllexport) specified when building arrow static library
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1723](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1723). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As I understand it, dllexport/dllimport should be left out when building and using static libraries on Windows. A PR will follow shortly.
